title: marandAyO ulagE
sahitya:
marandAyO ulagE paramporuLai


anupallavi

  pirandu pirandu sAgum piNa uDalukkaLai vizhundu vizhundu pOTri vINukkE ALAgi


caraNam    enadiyAn enginra irumAppuk-kOTTaiyil inda ulagaik-kAkka irangi vandOm enrE
dhana ghanavAnAgit-tanakkoru madam sheidu sAgOmenrE maNNAm jaga jAlangaLai nambi
